lexUnit.name: apex.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the top or highest part of something, especially one forming a point

sentence.text: The apex of the dome was surmounted by a colossal figure , over 16 ft. high , representing ` Progress " .
Well , doubt is something that strikes drivers when they have reached , and imperceptibly slipped past , the apex of their careers .
In 1943 a bomb entered the apex of the south wall , passed through the building and demolished the north wall , completely destroying the organ .
South Africa is a sub-tropical country forming the apex of the African Countries .
Bernice had reached the apex of the terminal dome by now .
Gingerly , she lowered herself onto the wall , and sat astride its smooth apex , still partially concealed by overhanging branches from the tree .
Overhead one vast angular monolith spun , its apex seeming about to crash down to shatter the dome .
There is irony , however , in this being the apex of Presocratic thought .
He made man , the apex of all creation .
We have called the University the apex of the educational edifice .
Subjects with adenomatous polyps had an increased cell proliferation with an increasing trend of proliferating cells towards the apex of the crypt as has been found by thers .
Mother , daughter and father with son on his shoulders holding a toy gun at the apex of a neatly composed pyramid .
He taught her a position for sleeping that placed the forepart of her brain at the apex of a pyramid .
In the mornings I used to sit out in the warm sun of our terrace and read the travellers ' descriptions of the Delhi they knew from their visits at the very apex of the Mughal Empire .
Elections may help produce the personnel at the apex of government but they tell us little about likely public policy .
Ventilation was provided by slits sited high in its stone-built walls and the gables contained owl-holes close to the apex of the roof ( Plate 1 ) .
Now that the apex of the pyramid was gone , there was no obvious way for decisions to be reached , .
There , under the apex of the roof , was a small window , open a few precious inches .
This allows the flashing material to be easily applied without dressing and provides a discreet and weatherproof method of ventilating the apex of a lean-to roof .
Rolling over , he assumed a sitting position and used his heels to push himself up the slates on his backside until he was seated astride the apex of the roof .
